document.full_text: at 61, tom watson became the second-oldest winner of the  senior p.g.a. championship when he sank a 4-foot putt on the first playoff hole to seal his victory.
document.title: looking like his old self, watson adds another major title
lines_and_colors: at 61, tom watson became the second-oldest winner of the  senior p.g.a. championship when he sank a 4-foot putt on the first playoff hole to seal his victory.
